criticism: The random function generates a random value, but it does not inform the user about the potential risk.
The executeRoom function uses random() to pick a dead seat in the room, introducing a potential vulnerability.
Integer overflow in getRoom function allows the CTO to retrieve the balance of a room.
Integer overflow in distributeFunds function allows the CTO to set the balance of an arbitrary user to zero.
Integer overflow in payout function allows the CTO to set the balance of an arbitrary user to zero.
Integer overflow in refund function allows the CTO to set the balance of an arbitrary user to zero.
